reuters.title: CHRYSLER TO IDLE 2,800 WORKERS AT ILLINOIS PLANT
reuters.body: General Motors of Canada Ltd, wholly owned by General Motors Corp, said February car sales fell 17.8 pct to 25,779 units from 31,361 units the previous year. Year-to-date car sales fell 23.8 pct from last year, the company said. It did not immediately disclose actual year-to-date figures. Reuter 
